website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for total protection of every inch of your Galaxy S9 Plus, then this screen protector is the one for you.
pros: The built-in kickstand and 360-degree protection make this the ultimate screen protector for your smartphone
It even comes with the option of choosing between seven different stylish colors
cons: Sometimes the kick-stand was found to slip out of place, falling out of the case altogether

customer_reviews.title: Screen scratches
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous piece of soft plastic for the screen renders the whole case unusable. It took less than a day to look like the cat attacked it. Tiny scratches everywhere. I shouldn't need protection for my protection! Sent it back and Got my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Adler

customer_reviews.title: It definitely protects!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this case for a while. Wasnt a fan of the screen protector at first but it grew on me. Have dropped it a few times out of the pocket etc. Two days ago it shined!!! Dropped it 3 stories of a ladder (stil not sure how it came out of my pocket) and the damage in the photo was it. ZERO phone dmg not a scratch. Bought a second one 10 minutes later to replace it. Great work.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible protection
customer_reviews.text: I had this case on my phone for about a week, dropped the phone only about a foot off the ground, and the case did nothing to protect my phone. The back of my phone shattered inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great case, fits  perfectly, looks stylish and amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this case already!! After reading reviews on it and most people seemed to be favorable, I decided to take a chance! Ordered Sunday evening and got on Tuesday! VERY EASY to install, love the built in screen protector (still can use all features including "the edge") looks even nicer in person, than the picture and love the kickstand! Fits PERFECTLY very snug and protective around the phone. Great price too! Plain cases at phone store $40 +! This half that! Very happy and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Clark

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Solid case.
customer_reviews.text: I got my YOUMAKER S9 plus case earlier than scheduled. This made my day. Pulling apart the two pieces was a bit hard at first, but I finally got them apart. The screen protector was not ideal for me since it bubbled up when I put it on my phone. So, per the reviews I read it said that the plastic screen protector can be separated. I took that part out and just used the hardware. All was good after that. The case feels sturdy with the phone in. I love the kick stand and the back design. Solid case cover. I got the purple & love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jtazzers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for s9+
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and feels great on the phone. Built in screen protector is perfect, feels like it's not even there. The buttons on the side for volume fell so much better than the featureless buttons on the phone itself. The ridges at the top and bottom seem to protrude about 1/8" so if you drop your phone face down the screen will be protected under most scenarios. Side ridges give enough room to still use the edge of the screen easily. So far it's a great case for anyone wanting a thicker more durable feeling case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Miller

customer_reviews.title: Provides protection, and weight
customer_reviews.text: Makes device a bit heavy. Not a big deal for me but may be for others. Both the USB and head phone ports are covered with rubber flaps and must be pulled back in order to plug something in each time. Kind of a pain. The clear, protective front cover has let small debris get underneath at times so I've had to take the cover apart in order to clean it. This has only happened once in the month or so that I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: MisterReed

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with a tempered glass screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on and it broke my tempered glass screen protector! The description should warn about this!! *Updated 10.23.18 to add that the tab that is used to open the kickstand broke off a couple weeks ago. Now I have to find a knife every time I want to pop out the kickstand and TSA threw away my tiny pocket knife!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but apparently cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this a higher rating, I really did. Looks really cool and less than half the price of the Otterbox and even came with a kickstand. Problems started at the beginning... -I noticed a crack on the top left area of the screen cover which may have happened trying to get the phone in the first time as I hadn't dropped or damaged it otherwise. -The kickstand is notorious for popping out of its latches and now it has already worn down to the point where the entire thing pops out of the base at the first sign of pressure when propped.
customer_reviews.author: PopeyeMcD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but make sure to buy another screen protector...
customer_reviews.text: It looks sturdy enough, I haven’t dropped it yet to actually try it out and see how well it protects but looks good. Definitely makes the phone look bulkier but it’s worth it if it will protect it. The Built in screen protector looks cheap (just a plastic) so I actually bought another one, put that one on first and now it feels like the screen is really protected. The kickstand is what actually makes this a cool nice phone case. The edges feel protected but aren’t cover so it’s still a usable feature. UPDATE: After only one week of use the screen is so scratched up and I've noticed it is not easy to type with it on....
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Shaddered phone...no answer.
customer_reviews.text: I emailed them regarding the phone plastic cracking from removing to clean the phone screen, over a month ago... No answer. I dropped the phone today while working out, less then two feet today and completely shattered the back of my phone and camera. I have to now pay $350 with insurance for the phone to be replaced, over a less then $30 phone case. I do not recommend. I've had cheaper cases work WAY better. They will not respond when they have a guarantee on the durability of a phone while in their case.
customer_reviews.author: WJ-JeepGirl

customer_reviews.title: No access to flash drive port.
customer_reviews.text: Do not like at all that I have to take the whole thing off to use the drive adapter, now I need to buy something else for my phone, for me a waste of money. Arthritis in hands, cant get the thing off after its been put on, so it's a big problem and one for me that's too much, otherwise the product is okay for the price, I didn't even mind the screen saver, but you cant use the back of the case without using the front and once it's all on I have alot of difficulty getting it back off to try and attach a flash drive, so really its useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Well made all-around case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy case. It encapsulates the phone very nicely. All of the phones buttons can easily be pressed without fail. Unfortunately, I dropped my phone at the gym and slightly scratched the clear screen. I'm just glad I had this case on my phone so I'm relieved. I would definitely purchase this case again and recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Rippem44

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and glitchy
customer_reviews.text: This is very rigid and probably offers good protection - but i just got it, so that's a guess. What i do know is that it is sooo hard to put on and get properly aligned. It took several tries and i broke a nail. The screen cover still isnt snug, it feels like tapping a plastic bubble. It also holds lots of finger smudges on the outside, and bits of dust and my dog's hair got stuck on the inside, just while putting it on. There are covers over the power and headhone ports, that are rigid and annoying to lift. Overall I'm not loving it.
customer_reviews.author: J Charles

customer_reviews.title: Protection...I think not.
customer_reviews.text: The case seems a little less protective than what I thought it was going to be. The materials seem flimsy and like if I drop my phone, the case would break as well as my phone.The "Built In Screen Protector " material is not terrible, but not great.The kickstand is flimsy and I'm sure won't last too long. Positive side.,well it makes my phone easier to carry because it adds size.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T.

customer_reviews.title: Best case out of the 4 I've had! Value & Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone since the month it came out and this is my second case of this specific brand and model. The first 1 I had was great the screen protector got hazy from years of wear and tear. I'm a mechanic so my phones seen abuse via liquids or tools and I have no complaints. Music is clear, speakers are not blocked, camera view is not obstructed, case never warped, nothing fell off. I've been throughly impressed! The back stand is in use all the time! For the price, in my opinion it's the best option I've found and this was my 4th different case I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Melo

customer_reviews.title: A good product will recommend to all my friends and family
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and really enhanced the looks of my phone. I got the blue one and the Wife got the purple one. Came in real handy too because on the very day I installed it, I had it in my pocket, was at work and accidentally put something else in my pocket. That something else rubbed against the screen area of my phone and really scratched up the protective cover. The cover took the damage but, not the phone. A good product will recommend to all my friends and family! Mine doesn't look so good now but, it saved my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Henry "Chip" Frappier

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This case surprised me as I was expecting something flimsy. It is sturdy and the screen protector went on without a hitch. I will know if it did its job of protecting my screen when its time to replace it. No problems with the finger print reader. The kick stand works well for me. It does not look cheap and I have had it now for a couple of months. Even if it breaks I think I would order another one. I am happy with my purchase especially since my phone throws itself on the ground all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For Until ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last October and loved the fact that the phone was protected but not too bulky, like Otter cases make them. However, the kickstand never worked smoothly. I always had to work at it to get it closed and it finally broke completely about a month ago. I read a review from a guy whose kickstand also broke and got an unsatisfactory replacement from the seller (or perhaps it was the manufacturer; doesn't really matter, in my opinion). I woulda been happy with just a new kickstand, but this review said they wouldn't do that. I'll be getting something different this time.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: So far very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was somewhat difficult to get the phone installed in the case even with the decent instructions. But once it's in, the fit is excellent, the phone is completely protected, and the screen sensitivity didn't require any adjustment. This case is great because the screen protector is integrated and popping off due to the curved screen is not an issue. The kickstand was a feature that was high on my list, and this one is easy to use and works very well. Time will tell as to the durability of the case. Last, but not least, the price is great for the features.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: while the reviews about scratches are true mine last for about a year before it becomes completely unusable. I've bought 2 so far. Wish they sold just replacement screens separately instead of whole case to fit with this. The crack on 1 pic is true but doesn't change use it's purely cosmetic. And doesn't happen right away i think its from use and taking cover off. Anyway, hands down BEST Cover protection. Will definitely purchase. Unless you're a nit picky person. IT DOES IT'S JOB AND PROTECTS YOUR PHONE!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Screen saver not scratch resistant
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd phone case I've purchased through YOUMAKER for the same Galaxy phone. The case is great, I love that part. What I don't like is the screen protector part. It scratches very easily. My other case by YOUMAKER had so many scratches on the screen saver part that I decided to try a new one. I used it maybe 2 days, I'm very careful as to where and how I set my phone down and already it's difficult to see due to scratches. If you could improve that part I'd be a repeat buyer with a 5 star rating for you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty, but also kind of bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Probably great for extremely heavy duty use, however it has its flaws: (1) Really hard to get on and off the phone! If you change SIM cards very often, this will be important to you. (2) Didn't like the little flaps over the charging ports. They are too stiff and I felt would eventually damage the connection by exerting constant one-way pressure. (3) The stand is cool, but bear in mind that it also makes the thing much thicker than a normal case. When the case is installed, the phone is uncomfortable to carry in ones pocket, due to its bulk.
customer_reviews.author: ScottS

customer_reviews.title: Get it!  It's awesome!  Great customer service too!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the first one but contacted Youmaker by email thru Amazon and they sent me a new one right away. Great customer service! As for use, I have dropped my phone 5 times in the last week and NO damage to the phone! I also love the stand and was able to attach a PopSocket and a lanyard. (Cell Phone Lanyard Cell Phone Strap Cell Phone Holder Neck Detachable Retractable Breakaway Silicone) Love, love, love this case and their customer service! One note, I did buy a screen protector "AquaShield HD Clear Anti-Bubble Film Screen Protector" for extra protection. Not sure if needed but using just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Melanie

customer_reviews.title: It fits my s9+ perfectly. Actually, about an ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits my s9+ perfectly. Actually, about an hour after I installed the case it fell out of my hands on gravel and it really protected my brand new $1000 phone! Update: Have had the case on my phone for a week. I am very happy with the durability this case seems to have. The only negative comment I have is that the screen protector does get scratched. In the past I have always had the flexible plastic "cling on" types and they never really showed big scratches. This; while is certainly keeps my phone from being scratched, might be hard to see through in time.
customer_reviews.author: Essie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I got what I was expecting. The case is durable and it protects the entire phone. The screen protector fit nicely. Buttons all worked in the case. The things you just got to get used to are 1) Case protects the USB port and the phone jack, so you have to pull them back everytime you want to charge or listen to the head phones, and 2) Screen protect gets oily quick so I'm cleaning it like twice a day, but when you look at the screen head on, it doesn't seem to affect the view. Every product has its quirks, but for $20 this case does what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: F. Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit! Color was right-on.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Oregon. Me and my children attended Oregon State so the color choice I made was in line with OSU's colors. The Samsung S9+ has a wrap display and the two-part case was ideal in that incorporated a screen protector withour becoming overly bulky or heavy. Frankly I do not use the nifty little stand however, it does come in handy for me to deploy and use as a holding tab occasionally. I'm a big guy and wear cargo pants with lots of pockets so the added bulk is no problem and the durability of the case offsets any issues in that arena.
customer_reviews.author: Duane C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the kickstand
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, and I really like the kickstand feature. Fingerprint reader works surprisingly well. I'll just guard the thin plastic screen against scratches, wont put it in the bottom of my purse, or near car keys, etc after reading other reviews. But it seems like a nice case. Buttons work easily, they aren't as stiff and the case isnt as bulky as my husband's otter box defender, (he needs the additional protection at his job). But for the money, this case seems to provide decent protection, especially the edge around the camera lens. I liked this shade of purple and the style of this case.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: S9+ CASE GOOD CASE BUT POOR MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: Case has great grip to hold. Kickstand is great for holding on to phone. Works well on wireless charger. UPDATE 9/21/19: Screen protector is getting really scratched now, and I have been taking care not to put it in a pocket with other items. Seems to be a really soft material. Kickstand on back has worn out enough that it keeps failing off! I really want to love this case because the kickstand feature really worked well for awhile. But after a couple of months it's wore out. Sorry to say it's an excellent idea but poor execution by using sub par materials. Downgraded stars from 5 to 3.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Monette

customer_reviews.title: Great S9+ Case
customer_reviews.text: My old case for my S9+ was getting, well, old and kinda sticky and yucky, it was time to get a new case. A My S9+ bout 1 week before I dropped my S8 (still in use) so I think I'm going to get one of these for that phone as well. Protect it from future breaks. Anyway, I like the little kickstand feature, but I wonder if you have considered a kickstand that would hold it in landscape mode. That would be better for watching tv or movies. Finally, I wish there were a clear back one, the phone color is so nice, but now I hardly see it now. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for expensive phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case for my hub's new S9+. He didn't want a case at all but I insisted, saying we would not spend another 1K on a phone when he dropped this one. (And he WILL drop it!) He really likes this case. It doesn't add much more size or weight to the phone, has a rubberized grip, and fully encases the phone. It even has as little kickstand he can use if he wants to prop up the phone. And, it looks "manly!" (His words!)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grip and I can charge on the cordless charger ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my new S9 plus and worried about dropping my phone and breaking the screen. The phone is very slippery without a case. I ordered the exact same case for my husband's phone a long time ago and he has dropped his phone so many times from the attic to the garage floor. This case is the first one that didn't break his phone when dropped. That's why I ordered the same one for my phone. Great grip and I can charge on the cordless charger with the case on. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy eye
customer_reviews.text: Today, 1st time, all day using Marco polo my picture is foggy to me and to others I am having conversations with. All in coming conversations and usage of the phone is clear. I took the cover off and my sending is clear. I cleaned off the screen inside and out with no change. I used a soft cloth as I use on my glasses. Where the lens shows through the plastic is a circle and I thought I should remove this and it would clear up, but did not want to do that without your opinion. Please respond to david-powell@live.com with what I can do. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone case, but I dropped it a bunch of times and it cracked. I contacted the supplier and they gave me another one. I dropped that one as well and it cracked in the same space - the thin strip on the bottom. However, I did love the case. It was durable and loved the kick stand (I got a new phone - that wouldn't fit in the case). I loved that it came with a screen protector. And it stayed together even after I dropped it a few times. I'm rough on phone cases, I drop them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK But It Has Limitations
customer_reviews.text: The case and the glass cover are very nice and it was easy to install. However, it does have a big drawback for me. The case does not allow for the insertion of the adapter that comes with the phone so you can plug in a thumb drive or other USB devices. So, if you need access you have to remove the case which kind of defeats the purpose in my mind. One good feature is the fact that you CAN use it and it does work for wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Good Case the first time
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a second one because the case did what it was supposed to and protected my phone when it flew off the toolbox and skidded across the rocks. The case and phone were fine, but the screen cover got damaged and was annoying to me. So I ordered another case, exactly like the original because it worked so well. This new case that was sent to me was scratched when I got it, so they sent a replacement. Now the gray part of the replacement case has turned yellow...not sure why or how, but it looks funny. It protects well, but something odd is going on with what it is made out of.
customer_reviews.author: R.N.

customer_reviews.title: Very dope case -> updated, 2 months later
customer_reviews.text: Have to say this case is amazing. Not the most aesthetically pleasing if you are the type that is not into carrying a bulkier phone. But if you are intending to protect the phone for ages then this case is perfect. The kickstand also works really well. I use it soooooooo much and have not appreciated any drop off in the mechanics or sturdiness. I would say the only downside is the built-in screen protector. While this is very convenient it is hard to clean it off to keep that crispy fresh look. Other than that still highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Waltersd

customer_reviews.title: Fit AND Function
customer_reviews.text: Keeps all the functions, perfect fit. This is a tough one to make a case for because the screen runs to the edge. Everything works, iris recognition, facial, screen sensitivity AND the edge screen. Stand is an unexpected bonus. NOTE: To disassemble this case you may find a set of plastic cell phone tools to be necessary. Example, Zacro 18 in 1 from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I installed the case without the plastic screen protector. Stupid me, I put my 2 days old brand new S9 PLUS in my jacket's open pocket. Grab my jacket from my car and guess what happen next. My brand new S9 PLUS dropped 5 feet to the concrete ground. This CASE is really worth the money not a scratch on my phone and just a tiny dent on the CASE. This SOB CASE is TOUGH. Because the front is curve, after it dropped, it prevent the phone screen from hitting the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my phone case
customer_reviews.text: Just got this phone case today and so far I love it! It fits my S9 Plus like a hand to a glove! Very pretty color orange and the kickstand works just fine. It can be a little hard to pull out at first, but don't jerk it or you might break it! You will have smudges, on the plastic cover part, which is expected, just use an eyeglass wipe to clean off the smudges, like you would do a pair of glasses. I definitely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fits with tempered glass screen protector
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this phone case. I also bought the TAURI tempered glass Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy S9+ to have on my phone at the same time and this phone case still fits great. Double the screen protection with no problem. I have not dropped my phone so I cannot say if it protects against drops or not, but I'm keeping positive. I got the lilac purple backing on my phone and so I bought the purple case. The colors are very similar and so I'm pleased with that. I like how the kickstand can prop the phone upright at a decent level compared to other case kickstands. I would recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good Thick Case, But Delicate Inner Frame Material
customer_reviews.text: A seemingly sturdy case which should protect your S9 series, but the plastic frame of brittle plastic can crack easily, as mine did from a short fall to a carpeted floor from about two feet (no phone damage). I like the look, plenty of soft TPU or silicone outer covering, along with excellent kickstand, but weak bezel/frame material needs re-engineering.
customer_reviews.author: FiveFormTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: DONT ORDER THERE 3RD PARTY AND MAKE YOU RETURN DEFECTIVE ITEM. NOT COOL..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered received the back fit but the top didnt even come close to snap togather it was defective sent 3 messages but no reply except to send back. The cost is 11.00 for a defective piece that I have no control in manufacturing and because there a 3rd party they want you to return, well im fung with paypal since I paid in good faith for a proper case. Not a defective case that Ive sent pictures of. BUYER BEWARE..
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow effect under fluorescent lights.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this case would solve all my problems. The case was great (love the kickstand) - but the built-in plastic screen protector was not! Mine had a persistent rainbow effect under fluorescent lights. No amount of cleaning or re-positioning would fix this. The screen looked fine 85% of the time. But the minute I took the phone to the office, or the grocery store - annoying rainbow colored streaks - like there was liquid under the plastic protector or something. If you can live with that - then you're golden! If not, please be aware of this effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Had this case on my phone during a deployment. Dropped my phone countless times, on the edge & flat on its face and back. So much so I broke the edge of the case in 3 places and the case still held up. Also, my phone still works perfectly and looks new. Only down side to this case is the kickstand can be a challenge to get out and if you have to plug your phone in, instead of using the wireless charger, the rubber doesnt lock back in place very well. I still would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: After searching for perfect case-Finally found it.
customer_reviews.text: I was having a very difficult time finding a case that would fit my Samsung S9+ due to the curved glass. I tried different glass protectors-broke 3- and was using a highly recommended pretty good case, but wouldn't help with the glass screen breaking. After researching I found YouMaker Full body case and was thrilled at the protection and beauty. It really is the perfect case so I don't have to worry about breaking the phone and can easily use it with the enclosed casing on front. Works much better than the glass protectors I was using. Good price and certainly worth it! I got the purple case and have been complimented on how sharp it looks. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: My favorite case!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this case. I have had my phone almost two years and this case has protected my phone without fail. I had this case for 9 months and switched to another. Dropped my phone and cracked my screen. I then purchased this case and I am able to still use my phone even though my screen has cracks. I purchased this third one when my phone dropped and the stand in the back broke off. Great case.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: New update 3\17\20 This took a tumble down the stairs. That heart sinking feeling as you watch it go. Picked it up and the phone is fine! Only issues is the case is cracked right above the charging port but that's nothing than a new phone purchase. Still happy I chose this case This is my second of this case since having my phone. Wanted to update the color and plus over time the wear n tear on my other. The phone is easy to.prop up so the kids can watch shows and it can takes tumbles and keep the phone safe.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love youmaker cases. This is probably my 4th or 5th. This one just wasn’t for me. I bought this for the kickstand mostly. While it works, most of the time. It’s difficult to operate. I either pull it all the way out, or not enough so it falls down. It’s also so thick my magnetic mounts for the vehicle don’t work anymore. It is rugged. It will protect your phone if you drop it. It just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: EriK

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: One of these lasted over two years. The only reason I'm buying another one is that water eventually gets under the screen cover, which makes it impossible to use a touch screen. Plus, the back kickstand eventually chips. Getting an orange one, maybe I'll find my phone more often then! I took this off my phone, and was astounded to see that my two year old phone looks pristine!
customer_reviews.author: Drumlin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I did get kind of worried reading all of the bad reviews. I just used common sense in general and keep my keys and my phone in separate pockets. You need to make sure the phone stand is closed all the way. I like how the case doesn't cover the flash or fingerprint scanner. It does take a bit of time to put on your phone. Read the directions and don't rush. Make sure your phone screen is clean before you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Kickstand feature is great. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold. I love the kickstand. It stands on place and gives the perfect height fo watching videos and movies. It is easy to assemble and remove. It will not protect well like more expensive cases, but it is not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A.Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Outdoors all day?
customer_reviews.text: I spend all day outdoors and find myself in the irregular situations as a nature photographer. I liked the idea of having my phone encased for extra protection. I did not take into consideration the vents at the top of the screen protector for sound and notification alert clarity. The fit isn't snug enough and acted like a vacuum as dust, pollen, dirt and even seeds from waist high grass started collecting inside the case. Dust and dirt with something less then perfect fit acts as an abrasive and as soon as I saw what fell out of the case after seeing the grass seed. Not gonna work!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors-good, Indoors-Bad

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a year, dropped the phone accidentally on cemet from over 4 ' height a couple of times, not single crack on the glass of the phone. This case protected the very well. Extremely pleased with it and buying another one, because I can count on it protecting my phone. Wife had a different manufacturers case on her phone, dropped her phone about 18" on the floor (NOT Cement), screen shattered. I will not trust my phone with any other manufacturers case, The Kickstand is a big plus, works well and has not become loose and hold the phone up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: I like the fully enclosed phone cases because they keep your phone looking new and it protects as well. This case will do that. The rubber closures on the bottom that seal the ports on your phone still close like they did when new. I don"t use the fingerprint scanner side so that is why the neutral rating on that aspect. I'll buy another if this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Phone case. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have reviewed this before and gave a decent review. I have since took the cover off to clean the screen because even with the protector on, it gets dirty somehow. Well when took apart I noticed the whole entire back of my phone is cracked. I'm so upset, I didn't get the phone insurance because we have too much going out, and decided we could save here and there. This said military grade, this was a new phone. only had a few days before your cover came in.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. The screen protector has no hang ups, meaning, it glides with ur finger n commands the phone like its not even there. There is no issue with the fingerprint sensor hole. The side buttons work well and it's a snug fit. The only issue I've had is when it gets just even the slightest bit wet water gets trapped between the screen protector n phone. U have to take it apart to dry it. So it's not a perfect seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kalikid30

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. It was a little bit difficult to put on because the material is tough and fits so well. Not a bad thing. I love that it comes with a built-in screen protector. I've already dropped my phone once from about 3 feet onto a tile floor with no damage to the phone or the case. The kickstand is quite handy. I like to read while I eat. Much easier with the phone propped up at this angle!
customer_reviews.author: Meeks

customer_reviews.title: best yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best case I have had yet for my cell phone. I have tried different ones-even the ones with the card holder b/c I thought they would be good. The ones that slide open are better than the ones that flip open. The ones that flip open may hold more cards, but the quality is crappy. I recommend this case to anybody who may be a little hard on cell phones, or who like to use them around water, because there is a rubber tab that prevents dampness from seeping into the charging port-or detecting any moisture. The only problem is it isn't compatible with wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R Logue

customer_reviews.title: Full protection
customer_reviews.text: This case protects your entire phone. There is an included screen protector built into the case. I decided to get this case after I had my screen crack even with a glass screen protector. No issues at all with this case. I haven't tried it on my Dex dock, but I don't think any cases work while using on that. This is a great way to protect your phone.
customer_reviews.author: RGFFSAN

customer_reviews.title: Great case, poorly designed kickstand
customer_reviews.text: I hace had 2 of these cases in the last 18 months. The case is sturdy, strong, has a good grip and it does a good job of protecting the phone when dropped. But only one problem. The kickstand keeps popping out of the case itself. It has occurred with both cases. The first one lasted a little bit over a year but the second one only lasted two months before the kickstand broke. The kickstand is one of the main reasons I bought this case and it is now unusable. I am considering replacing it with a different case only because of the kickstand issue.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: When I got the case today, I was so excited! It is sturdy, protects my phone and looks nice and elegant! Than I tried my charger stand and it did not charge! Than I discovered the little metal fork sign on the back, and a light came on: My charger stand was for my Galaxy7 and too short for the Galaxy9+. The new one was sitting too high. Crafty me, I glued a piece of hard foam on the bottom of the stand to lift the phone up, cut a window out to see the charger light and put the phone horizontal. It connects perfectly with the charger. BINGO!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Larrymore

customer_reviews.title: 5 outta 5
customer_reviews.text: *During the Covid quarantine, I paid for overnight shipping, and it came the next day; Points for that. *The case came with good instructions; Bonus points for this. *The product fit my S9+ perfectly. The buttons give a solid heptic click. The screen protector works so well, it seems like it's not there; Prestige Vendor Achievement unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Hajilo

customer_reviews.title: Screen Protector is very Flawed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little turned off initially bc the stand seemed to be a very flimsy plastic. But despite it constantly falling out of my pocket at work its hung in like a champ. I love this case minus one issue. The screen protector which is attached to the case, it can't be cleaned well and moisture become trapped under it and it'll stop reading my finger. It also emits an awful glare which has blinded my wife on more than one occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: An affordable and solid phone case
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for a little over a week and so far I really like it. It feels good and solid and secure when I hold it. I like the feeling of the material around the edges of the phone. Screen protector is very flush with the screen and I have had no issues with touch sensitivity. My only complaint is that the kickstand is a little difficult to pull out and pop back in. Other than that, I feel that this will be a very secure and affordable phone case.
customer_reviews.author: angela roark

customer_reviews.title: cheap, broke my phone to the point of insurance claim
customer_reviews.text: It was very complicated and didn't protect my phone at all. Now I have scratches and my phone hardly works. Spend the extra money and get an otter box. Believe me if you care for your phone its the only way to truly protect it. I am fighting with my phone insurance because this case ruined my phone. I should have waited to the new phone cases came out since I got this phone day one I didn't have options to buy good cases, this is a perfect example of why I do not buy cheaper cases
customer_reviews.author: Janet Brown

customer_reviews.title: Chic and Sexy but Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: My phone is dropped almost daily. This is my second one. I used the first one two years and loved it. Then somebody broke in my car and stole my phone. Looks awesome and the case is super durable. I even accidentally rolled over it in the yard with my car and it really takes a lickin. I'm so pleased that I bought a second one for my new S9+. I Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks/Chazzi44

customer_reviews.title: You make S9+ case
customer_reviews.text: Works good comes with glass for the case don't be fooled by Amazon with the bought together crap unless you want an extra in case of cracking. Not sure on durability but seems pretty good the kickstand part could be built a little more rugged but works well. Everything fits really tight no wobble or loose when you shake it. I give it 4 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, solid, yet affordable case. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Case slides into the screen protector frame, then into the rubber back. Sort of like an otter-box. I've had it for a little over six months when I snapped the kickstand through normal wear and tear. Contacted customer service and they sent one out right away, a replacement, at no charge. I've dropped my phone, screen down on concrete, tile, and other hard floors and it's still working well. Would easily recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: TheMovieHero

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh....
customer_reviews.text: Built in screen protector doesnt scratch easily and is very responsive. Low price. But its Mostly hard plastic and slips out of your hands and is bulky. kickstand pops out a lot. Ended up taking it off after a week and buying a Spigen case and its amazing for the money, should have just stuck with spigen. Had one on my s7 edge for over 2 years and did an amazing job protecting my phone. I also had the over priced otter box commuter case and the spigen is better for only $17. Just my 2cents.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust or remove once it's on.
customer_reviews.text: This case is very sturdy, but can be too sturdy. I can't get the volume buttons to work and going through settings to do so is a pain. I'd like to take it off and reinstall it to see if that helps but can't get it off. You are supposed to squeeze it right where the buttons are and the damn Bixby (S9+ phone) keeps opening. Can SOMEONE please help me before I destroy it trying to get it off? I've tried moving it, squeezing it, ANYTHING so the volume buttons can work. Otherwise, it's very pretty and too sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Debi W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case! I bought this for my new phone, and I feel much more secure while holding the phone now (I am NOT a graceful person). Better yet, it's beautiful. I love the orange! It was easy to put on, once I figured out how to take it apart (not difficult - I just had a moment). The video showing how to put it on was also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this case. Been using it for over a month and its absolutely amazing! Will definitely purchase again! This is not a bully case, gives great protection and love the built in screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: Torie Serkez

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend its awesome
customer_reviews.text: The case fits perfectly and it's easy to put together, it looks fantastic and it's everything that the manufacturer described, I'm not sure about the waterproofing I haven't tested that and hope not to, I would totally recommend a five star on this product The stand works great and folds away nicely, the only thing I'd wish I did was more research, I thought it had a holster clip, this was my bad, other than that it's a great product, in fact it's so great I bought the black on black for my wife's cell
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Quality cell phone protection!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cellphone case as my second replacement since purchasing my Samsung Galaxy 9 +. With the purchase price of cell phones becoming an investment level purchase and our increased dependence upon them, having a good proctive case is a must. This case is a robust product with corners protected well, a face shield and a sturdy stand, it is a quality case.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: I should stop wasting money
customer_reviews.text: It sucks. Main reason i bought it is the standing plastic to watch movies or videos, it broke the first day, so fragile and bad made. And holding it sucks even more, you need a extremely large hand to type comfortable on this. Edit the touch functionality sucks, it always makes me send characters i did not inted to send, or/and never responds to my commands when i touch the screen
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed so far - have had it for about a week. sturdy and easy to maneuver phone apps etc. feels good in hand, not cheap feel or look. well worth the $$ highly recommend. Have not dropped phone yet to test out durability. Will certainly return to comment when that happens
customer_reviews.author: almondeyes

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great case.
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this case, but I have found a few things worth mentioning. The protection I feel this phone has now is awesome. The lip and built-in screen protector are great. I feel like the case could use more grip. It feels a little too smooth for my liking and I think it can easily fall out of your pocket while sitting down. The phone itself is very slim and petite and this case adds a little weighty bulk to it, but I don't mind. The cutouts are where they should be and the kickstand, although nice, feels like you have to handle it with care. Overall, great case.
customer_reviews.author: MariaR

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my choice to purchase this case
customer_reviews.text: Paying close to almost 1K for a phone I was not just going to use any case/screen protector for my brand new Samsung Galaxy S9. So I did some research and even asked friends/family on social media for recommendations. Quite a few suggested this one and I had already narrowed it down to one of my top 3 choices. So after the recommendations I decided to buy it and I could not be more pleased. It was so easy to apply and I can happily say that my phone is truly protected!!
customer_reviews.author: Aromaz79

customer_reviews.title: Best case for the money IMO
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Screen protector is most impressive as it fits the curved screen perfectly. Nice design where phone snaps into screen protector frame then snaps into back. No issues with screen sensitivity or visual effects. Kickstand functions in 3 positions and can serve as a grip. Case has really good grip and buttons work perfectly. Good protection for screen on drops with adequate frame clearance on face of unit. Color me impressed.
customer_reviews.author: K Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great case, but the screen protector and stand are a big problem
customer_reviews.text: Overall impressed with this case and the feel. I'm going to say that I'm a bit bothered how difficult it is to open the stand out. I cannot physically open it with my fingers as the opening is too small. The majority of my issue with this case lands on the "screen protector" I've had this case for all of 30hrs and its begun to have deep scratches and scuffs. This is incredibly disappointing especially for how well built the case looks and seems
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Screen is not flush
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case but the cover is raised on the left side of my phone and not fully on the screen like it is stated in the description. I would like one that functions as intended please
customer_reviews.author: fransico montes

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my s9+. Was a bit hard to get on because of the tight fit, but im confident it wont come apart. Looks like its well made. Case front isnt as touch sensitive as a stand-alone screen protector, but it definitely isnt bad. Very clear, easy to get on without air bubbles. I can see the kickstand breaking if you arent careful opening and closing it. Case texture is just grippy enough to hold onto easily, but you can still slide it in a pocket. Definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great durable protection for your phone
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought my S9+ the day they were released Early March 2018. I have used this case for the 2 years the protective screen as little scratchy after 2 years of use but the phone is in perfect condition. I purchased the S20 ultra And I'm giving this phone to someone else so decided to get another case for them and love the 1st time so decided to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used this case for a month or so until I ordered a different one. I really have no complaints. The colors were beautiful, the kickstand was amazing and the screen protector gave me no issues when using. Installation and removal was simple. The only reason I stopped using this was because I'm a smoker so the grey/pink had awful yellow nicotine spots and was very obvious. I'm ordering another in a different color in a few days!
customer_reviews.author: xX.Andrea.Xx

customer_reviews.title: Water gets in very easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy product. It fits my wife's s9+ However, water gets in very easily through the top cover. Then she has to open the cover and clean the screen, otherwise the touch becomes unusable. This has happened several times in first few days. Update: After reading the first review, the seller contacted me and sent a new case. This was really nice as it shows they really care for the customer. However, the same thing happened with the new case, water got in and touch became unresponsive. Other than this issue the case is really good, which is why we have decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: azharul karim

customer_reviews.title: Good, but screen protector gets scratched easily
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this more stars. I really did. But the screen protector has scratches on it. You'd think the screen protector would protect against scratches from finger nails, etc. I'm not sure if that is something that would be covered under warranty or not. I like the kickstand. And the outer part seems very stable and protects well, but for a $1000.00 phone, I want the screen protector to be resistant from scratches, and it simply isn't. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This saved my bacon 3 days after installing it on my phone. I dropped it and it skipped across multiple surfaces. Put 2 small divets in screen protector, but phone and screen lived to tell the tale. The stand works great for watching videos also. Have had no issues with this product, and would highly recommend for others to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Garbage screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: This is without question a fantastic case, especially considering the kickstand and price... if only the screen protector wasn't cheap plastic that will get scratched to hell in days, rendering the case completely useless. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: BestBuyerEver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't review quickly because I like to see how the product holds up over time. I also never give 5 stars. I've had this for 9 months. I'm very happy with the color, quality, and ease. I don't even feel the screen protector, it fits very well. I've even removed to clean around edges when dirt gets into cut out portion on screen protector. It reassembles easily. It's been dropped several times and it's held up. Strongly recommend to anyone with slippery fingers.
customer_reviews.author: chrisf

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I like this case! 3 weeks in it had its first test. It crashed down off a shelf when the folks on the other side of the wall made everything jump. It hit a tile floor from about 3 ft up. No cracks, case stayed on, phone totally fine! The kickstand feature is great at work when referencing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: nativeofco

customer_reviews.title: Updated My Previous Review to 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and sturdy case. I upgraded my previous 4 star review to 5 stars. I left my phone on the top of my truck and drove away. My wife and I searched for 2 hours and could not find my phone. We Googled Find My Android and it showed the address where my phone was located. It was 5 houses up the street. The phone had fallen off the truck, bounced in the street and came to rest in my neighbor's lawn. The phone was not damaged at all. The case took a hit and the plastic around the screen protector broke, but it saved my phone. I am ordering a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Norris

customer_reviews.title: S9+..... Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very fast! They provide a very nice QR video link to guide you to properly install this case. The case fits my S9+ perfectly! All functions and buttons operate properly and are actually easier to find because of their slightly raised profile. Customer Service contacted me 10 minutes after the delivery just to make sure I wasn't having any problems....how cool is that?! ***** ~5 stars~ YEP! EDIT ~ EDIT ~ EDIT 03-14-2020 ....I broke my old case.... my big fat fingers. Replacement received quickly and the same excellent fit, quality and protection promised. youmkr and Amazon, I thank you!
customer_reviews.author: michael h. conrad

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a bit skeptical with built in screen savers, but this one is very good. The fit is absolutely perfect, not lag in response, and super slim. It's also very durable, and fits great in my hand. A lot of times these full cases make you feel like your holding a brick, but you hardly notice this one. Would 100% recommend if you're looking for a fully enclosed case, outside of the camera, to fit your active life style.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.  CHEAP CRAP.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP. This was a COMPLETE waste of money. I was excited when I first got it out of the box and tried to put it on my phone. During the installation process the "screen protector" (which is plastic) COMPLETELY RIPPED OUT. I had this case exactly 2 hours before I sent it back to the seller ONLY TO FIND OUT THEY WERE CHARGING ME 7.00 FOR A RETURN/REFUND. Do not, for the love of everything that is holy, give these people your money. YOU WILL REGRET IT IMMEDIATELY. If I could rate them -5 stars I would in a heartbeat! BEWARE, BUYERS REMORSE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: H Cory

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charger finicky
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this charger instead of my normal Unicorn Beetle/Supcase because of the style and color. It was easy to put on and seemed like it would protect my phone. I also purchased the following wireless charger -Wireless Charger, LK Qi Fast Wireless Charging Pad Stand for iPhone Xs Max/XS/XR/X, LG G7 ThinQ / V40 ThinQ, Samsung Galaxy Note 9/S9/S9 Plus, Google Pixel 3/3 XL All Qi-Enabled Devices by LK -- The phone however did not charge while in the Youmaker case. I will be returning the case for the other case mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, terrible face screen
customer_reviews.text: The overall case is great. I liked the way it fit the phone and was not very bulky. The buttons work well and the sensitivity on the screen was only slightly reduced. The only issue, the screen cover is bad. It gets scratched and marred very easy. If you slide it in and out of your pocket you will see scratches start to appear quickly. The front protective screen cover is soft plastic and will blemish almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: 360 cover
customer_reviews.text: The case had some issues that I noticed carrying it with my daily life. One the kick stand held up at first but then third time using it, it broke off. Second sand would get inside the phone causing it to look dirty and scratch so that part wasn't good plus I have no idea how it would get in there but it does. Other then that it does protect the phone from drops
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meza

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Love the kickstand. I'm happy the entire phone is protected. The ear phone Port and charging port have their own covers as well. The charging port cover is a bit annoying when trying to plug in, but I realize dust and stuff will be kept out the phone. I have no problems with the touch screen being responsive. Verizon didn't like me leaving their kiosk with a "naked phone" and tried to sell me a$55 cover. Just stop. This cover is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E.GOUGH

customer_reviews.title: Plastic screen protector not up to snuff
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product. Easy to assemble, great fit but after about 2 weeks of normal use the screen protector has noticable scratches and a big scratch...almost like a chip. Thankfully it protected the phone itself but was hoping for a little bit more durability out of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

product_meta.title: YOUMAKER Galaxy S9+ Plus Case, Heavy Duty Protection Kickstand with Built-in Screen Protector Shockproof Case Cover for Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus 6.2 inch (2018 Release) - White/Gray
feature_bullets: For Galaxy S9 Plus Case：Built-in kickstand for convenient hands free portrait and landscape viewing angles
For S9 Plus Case：Military Drop Tested. Dual layer provides 360 degree full body rugged protection.
For Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus Case：This case front cover is coming with a built-in screen protector.
For Samsung S9 Plus Case：Slim fit & Lightweight by YOUMAKER Design Team brings the super-excellent ergonomic appearance.
For Galaxy S9+ Case： YOUMAKER Heavy Duty Full Body Protective Case Compatible with Galaxy S9+ Plus 6.2 inch (2018 Release)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars7,460 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: With Built-in kickstand, Slim Fit, Lightweight, Full-body Rugged, Heavy Duty protection, Military Grade Protection
